nodes.text: Reestkii was a town located near the equator of the desert planet Jakku. It was also situated over four hundred kilometers away from the only settlement on the planet worth noting, called Niima Outpost. Reestkii—a name that, loosely translated into Galactic Basic Standard, meant "the leftover"—had no minable resources whatsoever, and barely enough agriculture for its inhabitants to survive.
